AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Transcription resources to delete.

RecordingSid.description: The SID of the [Recording](https://www.twilio.com/docs/voice/api/recording) that created the transcription to delete.

Sid.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Transcription resource to delete.
